Name: agents_anticipate_floods
Description: Dummy for having agents perfectly anticipate flood risks

Name: coastal
Description: Dummy for taking coastal floods into account (on top of fluvial floods)

Name: correct_pluvial
Description: Dummy for reducing pluvial risk for (better protected) formal structures

Name: defended
Description: Dummy variable for considering defended (vs. undefended) fluvial flood maps from FATHOM

Name: dem
Description: Digital elevation model (DEM) to be used with coastal flood data (MERITDEM or NASADEM)

Name: fuel_price_scenario
Description: Categorical variable to select scenario for fuel price (should be set to 1/2/3 for low/medium/high price growth)

Name: inc_ineq_scenario
Description: Categorical variable to select scenario for income distribution (should be set to 1/2/3 for low/medium/high income inequality)

Name: inflation_scenario
Description: Categorical variable to select scenario for inflation rate (should be set to 1/2/3 for low/medium/high growth rate)

Name: informal_land_constrained
Description: Dummy for forbidding new informal housing construction

Name: interest_rate_scenario
Description: Categorical variable to select scenario for interest rate (should be set to 1/2/3 for low/medium/high growth rate)

Name: pluvial
Description: Dummy for considering pluvial floods on top of fluvial

Name: pop_growth_scenario
Description: Categorical variable to select scenario for total population (should be set to 1/2/3 for low/medium/high population growth)

Name: climate_change
Description: Dummy for taking climate change into account in flood maps
